messages.subject: Re: I'm going to be unsubbing
messages.msgSnippet: Annette, I stay subscribed to the group but choose the no email option.  I just go to the website and read and post whenever I get a chance. That way, when I
messages.messageBody:
Annette,
I stay subscribed to the group but choose the "no email" option. I
just go to the website and read and post whenever I get a chance.
That way, when I get busy and don't get a chance to read posts, I
just don't.
Sheila

--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "momuv4sweetiepies
<momuv4sweetiepies@y...>" <momuv4sweetiepies@y...> wrote:
> Its not because of any reason other than my inbox is so full! I
can't
> keep up.
>
> It's definitely been interesting though and maybe I will try again
at
> a later date and see if digest or checking mail at the site works
> better for me.
>
> Annette

messages.subject: I'm going to be unsubbing
messages.msgSnippet: Its not because of any reason other than my inbox is so full! I can t keep up. It s definitely been interesting though and maybe I will try again at a later
messages.messageBody:
Its not because of any reason other than my inbox is so full! I can't
keep up.

It's definitely been interesting though and maybe I will try again at
a later date and see if digest or checking mail at the site works
better for me.

Annette
